properties.name: archive.search.allowed-paths
properties.description: List of allowed base paths for file search operations. Only files within these paths can be accessed.

properties.name: archive.search.audit-logging-enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable detailed audit logging for security purposes. Defaults to true.

properties.name: archive.search.audit.compress-rotated-files
properties.description: Whether to compress rotated log files.

properties.name: archive.search.audit.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable audit logging.

properties.name: archive.search.audit.log-file
properties.description: Audit log file path.

properties.name: archive.search.audit.log-pattern
properties.description: Log format pattern.

properties.name: archive.search.audit.log-to-console
properties.description: Whether to log to console in addition to file.

properties.name: archive.search.audit.max-file-size
properties.description: Maximum audit log file size.

properties.name: archive.search.audit.max-history
properties.description: Maximum number of audit log files to keep.

properties.name: archive.search.enabled
properties.description: Whether the archive search API is enabled. Defaults to false for security reasons.

properties.name: archive.search.excluded-paths
properties.description: List of paths that should be excluded from search operations. These paths will be blocked even if they are within allowed paths.

properties.name: archive.search.ldap.base-dn
properties.description: Base DN for LDAP searches.

properties.name: archive.search.ldap.bind-dn
properties.description: LDAP bind DN for authentication.

properties.name: archive.search.ldap.bind-password
properties.description: LDAP bind password for authentication.

properties.name: archive.search.ldap.connection-timeout
properties.description: Connection timeout in milliseconds.

properties.name: archive.search.ldap.read-timeout
properties.description: Read timeout in milliseconds.

properties.name: archive.search.ldap.url
properties.description: LDAP server URL.

properties.name: archive.search.ldap.use-s-s-l
properties.description: Whether to use SSL/TLS for LDAP connections.

properties.name: archive.search.ldap.user-search-base
properties.description: User search base DN.

properties.name: archive.search.ldap.user-search-filter
properties.description: User search filter pattern.

properties.name: archive.search.max-concurrent-operations
properties.description: Maximum number of concurrent search operations allowed. Defaults to 5.

properties.name: archive.search.max-directory-depth
properties.description: Maximum depth for directory traversal during search operations. Defaults to 10 levels.

properties.name: archive.search.max-file-size
properties.description: Maximum file size in bytes that can be processed. Defaults to 100MB.

properties.name: archive.search.max-search-results
properties.description: Maximum number of search results to return. Defaults to 100.

properties.name: archive.search.search-timeout-seconds
properties.description: Timeout for search operations in seconds. Defaults to 30 seconds.

properties.name: archive.search.security.allowed-ip-addresses
properties.description: List of IP addresses allowed to bypass authentication (for testing).

properties.name: archive.search.security.enable-csrf-protection
properties.description: Whether to enable CSRF protection.

properties.name: archive.search.security.jwt-secret
properties.description: JWT secret key (will be generated if not provided).

properties.name: archive.search.security.lockout-duration-minutes
properties.description: Lockout duration in minutes after max failed attempts.

properties.name: archive.search.security.max-login-attempts
properties.description: Maximum number of failed login attempts before lockout.

properties.name: archive.search.security.require-authentication
properties.description: Whether to require authentication for all operations.

properties.name: archive.search.security.session-timeout-minutes
properties.description: Session timeout in minutes.

properties.name: archive.search.supported-archive-types
properties.description: List of supported archive file types. Only these archive types will be processed.

properties.name: archive.search.upload.allowed-extensions
properties.description: List of allowed file extensions.

properties.name: archive.search.upload.create-directories
properties.description: Whether to create directories if they don't exist.

properties.name: archive.search.upload.max-concurrent-uploads
properties.description: Maximum number of concurrent uploads.

properties.name: archive.search.upload.max-upload-size
properties.description: Maximum upload file size in bytes.

properties.name: archive.search.upload.preserve-timestamps
properties.description: Whether to preserve original file timestamps.

properties.name: archive.search.upload.temp-directory
properties.description: Temporary directory for upload processing.

properties.name: archive.search.upload.upload-directory
properties.description: Base directory for file uploads.
